about.title: About Purix
about.subtitle: We're on a mission to democratize educational game creation through artificial intelligence

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: At Purix, we believe every educator should have the power to create engaging, personalized learning experiences without technical barriers. Our flagship product, Wonderix, transforms the way educational games are created by enabling teachers and parents to build interactive learning tools through simple conversation.
mission.impact: We're not just building technology; we're building a future where quality education is accessible, engaging, and tailored to every learner's needs.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.content: Pushing the boundaries of AI to make educational content creation intuitive and powerful.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.content: Ensuring every educator, regardless of technical expertise, can create amazing learning experiences.

impact.title: Impact
impact.content: Measuring our success by the positive change we bring to education worldwide.

team.title: Our Team
team.content: Purix was founded by Bruce and Jeff, two technical founders who are both fathers and care deeply about education. Bruce has spent the past decade building cutting-edge AI applications, while Jeff is an experienced product engineer with a passion for creating intuitive, user-friendly experiences.
team.personal: As parents ourselves, we understand the challenges educators and families face in keeping children engaged and learning. This personal connection drives our commitment to making educational technology that truly works.
team.expertise: We're backed by a network of experienced educators who serve as consultants, ensuring that Wonderix meets the real needs of teachers and parents. Their invaluable insights help us bridge the gap between advanced AI technology and practical classroom applications.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.quote: "A world where every educator is empowered to create engaging, personalized learning experiences that inspire and educate the next generation."

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.content: We'd love to hear from you. Whether you're an educator, investor, or just curious about what we're building.

founders.title: Meet the Founders
founders.subtitle: Two fathers on a mission to make learning magical through AI-powered games

bruce.bio: Bruce brings over a decade of experience in machine learning and AI product development. A graduate of National Chiao Tung University, he has led products across semiconductor, digital reading, healthcare and live streaming. As a father of two, Bruce understands firsthand how children thrive when learning is fun and engaging. This insight drives his mission to revolutionize educational gaming through AI-powered tools.

jeff.bio: Jeff brings 7+ years of experience from software startups with a focus on creating exceptional user experiences. A graduate of National Taiwan University, Jeff specializes in making complex technology accessible through intuitive design. As a father of a 6-year-old, he experiences daily how learning through play sparks genuine happiness and growth in children. This insight fuels his passion for building Wonderix's delightfully simple interface.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Bruce and Jeff met at their previous company where they worked together and discussed AI products daily. Through these conversations, they discovered a shared vision for building innovative products that could make a real difference in people's lives. Both being fathers, they understood the challenges of keeping children engaged while learning. This common ground, combined with their complementary skills in AI and user experience, led them to co-found Purix and create Wonderix.
